descriptionHTML:
The Scared Creatures will populate your Android Wear Watch with this interactive Watch Face. Choose between an analog and a digital Watch Face – the creatures will be happy to live on either!

As soon as you look at your watch or touch your device the scared creatures will disappear, only to reappear immediately.

In the settings you can decide if the Scared Creatures should go away by touching or viewing the watch. In addition you can set the number of creatures.

If you want, it is possible to set a fixed background color, otherwise the background of android Wear Watch Face will change with every disturbance of the creatures.

Download your new interacitve Watch Face now and let the Scared Creatures live on your watch screen!


Don't forget to download the corresponding Live Wallpaper!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fluerapps.scaredcreaturesfree



To use touch on this interactive Watch Face you need the latest Version of Android Wear (v1.3+).
This app is based on the open source code of Boo!
https://www.androidexperiments.com/experiment/boo
